name: When She Was There
description:
When She Was There is a Visual Novel game which the story will bring you down to tears. Download and Install it now in order to play and be inspired in our game.

Minimum system requirements:

*System: Win XP,
*CPU: 1.8Ghz
*RAM: 1GB
*Virtual RAM: 512MB

Recommended system requirements:

*System: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
*CPU: 2Ghz Dual Core
*RAM: 2GB
*Virtual RAM: 1GB
